medical_history.chief_complaint: Cramping epigastric pain with radiation to the back.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient developed heartburn at 3pm yesterday, which resolved after following an anti-reflux regimen. He awoke suddenly at 2am with cramping epigastric pain that radiated to the back and presented to the emergency department. He has a prior history of similar heartburn symptoms.
medical_history.past_medical_history: DM1 diagnosed at an unspecified age.
medical_history.family_history: Family history includes Alzheimer's and breast cancer. Denies anyone with DM or gallbladder/pancreatic issues.
